about_the_game:
Make every second count.
First of its kind open world emergency medical simulator, learn and experience the world of EMS,
Featuring in-depth interaction options and real-life systems, in depth responsive and realistic human body, visual + auditory and text based representation of the scenes and player area.


Realistic Medical Simulation: Get ready for an accurate and immersive medical system that will challenge your skills and decision-making abilities.
Choose Your Level: Opt for Basic Life Support (BLS) or challenge yourself with Advanced Life Support (ALS) scenarios.
Multiplayer Madness: Team up with friends or fellow enthusiasts in multiplayer mode, complete with voice chat for seamless communication.

Why Play Paramedics! - EMS Simulator?
Passion for Emergency Medicine: If you're passionate about emergency medicine, this game offers an exciting way to explore your interests and have fun.
Future EMS Professional: Whether you're considering a career as an EMT or paramedic or are already in the field, Paramedics provides a platform to refine your skills.
Early Development, Growing Potential: Join us during these early stages and be part of the journey as Paramedics evolves and expands.
Minimum System Requirements (Early Development):

content_descriptors.notes: In this EMS simulator you will be exposed to realistic scenes and situations as close as possible to the real world.

name: Paramedics! - EMS Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 +
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 +
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: First of its kind open world emergency medicine simulator, bringing the option for players around the world to try, learn, and experience what it takes to be in emergency medical services, featuring in-depth and real-life systems, and a responsive human body. You choose what protocols to follow.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
